
# AI Use cases for the Insurance Industry

* Vehicle damage assessment
* Fraud Detection
* Claims management to ease the process


## Vehicle damage assessment
* Severity of damage
* Which parts are damaged
* Does it require repair or replacement
* Estimating the cost of repair or replacement

![Using AI for claim management](/Images/magicflow.png)
![AI in various steps of the process](/Images/insurance_valid.png)

## Leasons learnt while Building a Damage assessment system
* Finding a proper data set
* Privacy concerns
* Optimizing performance and cost
* If possible building 3D models and using them to train classifiers to achieve higher precision

[Altoros Blog post](https://www.altoros.com/blog/automating-car-damage-estimation-for-insurance-with-machine-learning/)
